SELECT A.inOutSeq, A.inOutDt, (A.qty * -1) qty, B.prodCd, B.prodNm, B.option1, B.option2 FROM ( SELECT * FROM tblProductInOut WHERE flagYN = 'Y' AND inOutDt BETWEEN #{findStartDt} AND #{findEndDt} AND qty < 0 ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tblProduct WHERE flagYN = 'Y' ) B ON B.prodCd = A.prodCd
GROUP BY A.inOutSeq ORDER BY A.inOutDt DESC
